attributes.action: Football Supporters should elect the England Manager
attributes.additional_details: The FA have repeatedly failed to appoint a successful England Manager. I propose that it is time to let supporters to elect the next manager by voting. Ballot papers would be issued to Fans that attended matches. They could choose from a list of suitably qualified candidates that put themselves forward with an appropriate number of nominations.FA committee members have no particular skills to make the appointment, nor have they shown any.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA.
